meanings.definition: A substance that decreases sexual desire or libido.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an anaphrodisiac to help reduce his excessive sexual urges.
meanings.sent2: She avoided foods known to act as an anaphrodisiac to maintain her focus on work.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about a fictional anaphrodisiac causing chaos at a singles' party.
meanings.sent4: The rainy weather seemed to act as an anaphrodisiac, dampening any romantic mood.
meanings.sent5: The anaphrodisiac's effect was so strong that he lost interest in dating altogether.

meanings.definition: Causing a decrease in sexual arousal or interest.
meanings.sent1: The boring movie had such an anaphrodisiac effect that they both fell asleep.
meanings.sent2: The stressful week at work left her feeling anaphrodisiac towards any romantic gestures.
meanings.sent3: The loud construction noise outside was like an anaphrodisiac to their intimate evening.
meanings.sent4: The cold, clinical atmosphere of the hospital was an anaphrodisiac to any romantic feelings.
meanings.sent5: The awkward silence between them acted as an anaphrodisiac, killing any chance of romance.
